top scrolling features included
Welcome to the Orange Blossom Opry (OBO)
, a state-of-the-art sound and lighting venue designed to deliver an exceptional live music experience. Located in Weirsdale, Florida, our intimate 522-seat theater provides a listening room environment, ensuring that every guest enjoys the highest quality sound and visuals. With acoustically tuned settings, water-based haze effects for select concerts, and adjustable stage lighting, OBO is the perfect place to experience live music in a truly immersive way.
Policies for an Enjoyable Experience
To ensure a safe and enjoyable experience for all our guests, we kindly ask that you adhere to the following policies:
1.            Ticket Purchases:
For your safety and to avoid fraudulent transactions, we cannot verify the authenticity of tickets purchased from third-party sellers. Please purchase tickets directly from our official website, app, or through our box office.
2.            Prohibited Items:
Backpacks and oversized bags are not permitted inside the theater. Each guest is allowed one bag.
Exceptions will be made for medically necessary items, subject to proper inspection.
For your safety and security, bag checks are conducted at the entrance.
Please note: While a clear bag is not required for entry, using one allows for quicker and more efficient inspections, reducing the chances of errors during the process. It also aligns with the Department of Homeland Security's "If You See                   Something, Say Something" campaign.  Every event at the Orange Blossom Opry is staffed by security personnel.  Video cameras are located throughout the venue and are actively monitored.
3.            Food and Drinks:
Outside food and drinks, or water bottles are not allowed inside the theater.
4.            Phones and Devices:
Please silence all phones and electronic devices before the show begins to avoid disruptions.
5.            Photography and Video:
To maintain the integrity of the performances, video recording and flash photography are strictly prohibited. No camera or video equipment, tripods, or selfie sticks.
6.            Service Animals:
Certified, trained service dogs are allowed in the theater. Emotional support animals are not permitted. Please contact the box office for any questions or additional information.
7.            Wheelchair Seating:
Wheelchair-accessible seats must be purchased through the box office. Please note that these seats are designated specifically for wheelchairs and cannot accommodate folding chairs or walkers.
8.            No Smoking:
No tobacco products, including e-cigarettes or vape pens.
A Rich History
The Orange Blossom Opry has been a cornerstone of live entertainment in Florida, hosting talented artists and fostering a vibrant community of music lovers. The OBO is more than just a venue; it is a space where memories are made, stories are shared, and music brings people together.
We look forward to welcoming you to our next show!
